item.description: Please  join us at Bushnell Park in front of the Capitol in Hartford for our first annual GMO Free  farmer's market and fair.  We will have GMO (Genetically Modified Organism) free produce from the farmers, live music and speakers from Right to Know CT who have been working with the state legislature to get these foods labeled.  Come shop at the farmers market, listen to music and learn about GMO's.  Speakers will talk about what crops are genetically modified and how you can avoid these potentially toxic foods.  WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT TO GET THESE GMO's OUT OF OUR FOOD SUPPLY! Please join us to show your support for our efforts to get these products labeled.  See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Drive through the arches and we will be on the right hand side. Right in front of the Capitol Building.
item.name: GMO Free Farmer's Market & Fair
